\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
&& X && Y && Z \\
{\,} && X && {Y'} && Z && {\,}
\arrow["f", from=1-3, to=1-5]
\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=2-3]
\arrow["g", from=1-5, to=1-7]
\arrow["{\varphi }", from=1-5, to=2-5]
\arrow["\simeq"', draw=none, from=1-5, to=2-5]
\arrow[equals, from=1-7, to=2-7]
\arrow["{f'}", from=2-3, to=2-5]
\arrow["{g'}", from=2-5, to=2-7]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
